MyContacts
Class Group

java.lang.Object
  MyContacts.Group

public class Group
extends java.lang.Object

  • This class creates object Group and contains all methods that deals with this object.
  • Object Group represents a group of contacts.
  • Object Group attributes :
  • *User name : the user which this group of contacts belongs to.
  • *Group name : name of the group.
  • *Contact list : list of contacts at this group.
  • *Path : path of the file *.txt that contains all the contacts.

    • Author:
    Thunder Bolt

    saveGroup

    public boolean saveGroup(boolean save,
                         boolean encrypted,
                         java.lang.String path)
    Writes the contact list in a file.

    Parameters:
    save - takes true if the process is save , and false if the process is export or save as.
    encrypted - takes true if the contacts will be written in a certain code , false otherwise.
    path - the path of file to be written in.

    importCheck

    private void importCheck(int numberOfContacts,
                         int lengthOfContactList,
                         Contact[] contactList,
                         boolean duplicated,
                         boolean notValid,
                         int duplicatedContacts,
                         int inValidContacts)
                  throws java.io.IOException
    Get the user option whether to fix the file imported if it is corrupted or no.

    Parameters:
    numberOfContacts - number of contacts.
    lengthOfContactList - length of the array.
    contactList - the array of contacts.
    duplicated - true if there is duplicated contact(s).
    notValid - true if there is corrupted contact(s).
    duplicatedContacts - number of duplicated contacts.
    inValidContacts - number of corrupted contacts.
    Throws:
    java.io.IOException

    getModDelData

    private int[] getModDelData(java.lang.String delMod)
                     throws java.io.IOException
    Prompts the user for information about the contact to be modified or deleted.

    Parameters:
    delMod - Kind of operation the user gonna perform on the contact (delete \ modify).
    Returns:
    rank of the wanted contact.
    Throws:
    java.io.IOException

    search

    private int[] search(java.lang.String wanted,
                     Contact[] contactList,
                     int search,
                     boolean lastName)
    Search for a group of contacts that have something in common in an arrray of contacts.

    Parameters:
    wanted - The last name to be searched for.
    contactList - The list to be searched in.
    search - the result of binary search on this last name or last&first.
    lastName - true if it is used to search on just last name.
    Returns:
    array of 3 integers first element is rank of first contact with that last name, second element is rank of last contact, third element is number of contacts with this last name.
